text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-PatientImportance
  • Include all codes defined in http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/patient-importance

name: PatientImportanceValueSet
title: Patient Importance Value Set
description: Patient importance status codes derived from customer-specific code mappings, used to trigger or limit Health Data Connect patient operations.
